pullrequest.title: Plotting Palette: Refresh when models are inserted or deleted

content.raw:
Modified in 490a9ca. The behavior is the following:

* `World::Update()`: Send item updates to filter owners and notify item changes via messages.
* `World::Step()`: Notify changes in items via messages. If simulation is paused, the plotting tool will get the updates.
content.html:
Modified in 490a9ca. The behavior is the following:

  • World::Update(): Send item updates to filter owners and notify item changes via messages.
  • World::Step(): Notify changes in items via messages. If simulation is paused, the plotting tool will get the updates.
